an3.19:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato papaniko abhabbo anadhigatam va bhogam adhigantum, adhigatam va bhogam phatim katum.
an3.19:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, papaniko pubbanhasamayam na sakkaccam kammantam adhitthati, majjhanhikasamayam na sakkaccam kammantam adhitthati, sayanhasamayam na sakkaccam kammantam adhitthati.
an3.19:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi angehi samannagato papaniko abhabbo anadhigatam va bhogam adhigantum, adhigatam va bhogam phatim katum.
an3.19:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigatam va kusalam dhammam adhigantum, adhigatam va kusalam dhammam phatim katum.
an3.19:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam na sakkaccam samadhinimittam adhitthati, majjhanhikasamayam na sakkaccam samadhinimittam adhitthati, sayanhasamayam na sakkaccam samadhinimittam adhitthati.
an3.19:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigatam va kusalam dhammam adhigantum, adhigatam va kusalam dhammam phatim katum.
an3.19:3.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato papaniko bhabbo anadhigatam va bhogam adhigantum, adhigatam va bhogam phatim katum.
an3.19:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, papaniko pubbanhasamayam sakkaccam kammantam adhitthati, majjhanhikasamayam …pe… sayanhasamayam sakkaccam kammantam adhitthati.
an3.19:3.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi angehi samannagato papaniko bhabbo anadhigatam va bhogam adhigantum, adhigatam va bhogam phatim katum.
an3.19:4.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhabbo anadhigatam va kusalam dhammam adhigantum, adhigatam va kusalam dhammam phatim katum.
an3.19:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam sakkaccam samadhinimittam adhitthati, majjhanhikasamayam …pe… sayanhasamayam sakkaccam samadhinimittam adhitthati.
an3.19:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhabbo anadhigatam va kusalam dhammam adhigantum, adhigatam va kusalam dhammam phatim katun”ti.
